segments.text: I see the woman standing serenely in front of the sink, lost in her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her knee-length dress flutters slightly from a breeze sneaking in through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely oblivious to the water cascading over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle at her feet is widening, yet she continues polishing without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder how long it will take for her to notice the mess she’s inadvertently creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is so calm, almost mocking the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of worry for her—will she see the water before it causes real damage?
segments.speaker: PAR
